name: No One Left Behind
description: NOLB is a 2.5D mini-adventure game which places you in a dark forest with the goal of rescuing all of the lost girls in the forest before finding the exit. Each rescued girl increases the brightness of your light, making it easier to see your surroundings. Monsters lurk in the forest which attempt to steal rescued girls from your party. Each time you play, the level is randomly generated so each playthrough is different. This game was made at a Game Jam at Ritsumeikan University in Japan, and won first place.
